main event: A bright bluish-green light was observed descending vertically at a rapid rate and then fading out near Hanna City AFS.
interesting points: The light was described as stationary before descending rapidly,The observer did not believe the light was an aircraft,No sound was reported during the sighting,The sighting lasted between 5 to 10 seconds,The document related to this sighting appears to include radar analysis suggesting the object may have been a balloon.
witness description: individual associated with Hanna City AFS
